#  Trigonometric Functions

Reading Materials: \newline

### Pythagorean Identities

\begin{equation}
\sin^2 \theta + \cos^2 \theta = 1
\end{equation}

\begin{equation}
1 + \tan^2 \theta = \sec^2 \theta
\end{equation}

\begin{equation}
1 + \cot^2 \theta = \csc^2 \theta
\end{equation}
